## R Markdown

```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
fullset %>%
  filter(SP == 1) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Yrs, y = FB_MPH)) + 
    geom_jitter() + 
  geom_smooth()
```

```{r}
fullset %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = Yrs, y = FB_MPH, color = SP)) + 
    geom_jitter() + 
  geom_smooth()

```



```{r}
fullset %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = SP)) + 
  geom_bar()+ 
  labs(title = "Pitcher Type Count", y = "Total")
```
